segments.text: What a messy situation in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is gushing water all over, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is gross, spreading out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she just keeps drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby, probably getting splashed too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing for cookies, making it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is unstable, but he's focused on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats like that in a flooding kitchenâ€”irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to the cabinets looks inevitable and ugly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice view of the garden can't make this appealing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a sloppy, hazardous scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
